name: Hotstreak
description:
Hotstreak

Chicken Twiddle uses her love for chilies to escape from the evil Spicy Drumstick Corp. factory! Many dangers await on her perilous dash for freedom including grills, deep-fry pits and sawblades. The magical frosty chili helps to calm Twiddle's nerves. How far can she go? 

How to Play: 

  1. Twiddle runs in curves. Change direction with spacebar or left mouse button
  2. Eat chilies for extra points, however the hotter the chili the more it increases the speed of the game. 
  3. Avoid being hit by obstacles!
